channel.title: Spec atks hit double
channel.description: How do you make spec atks hit double.. like for dds.. mage bow... and gmaul.. i have the specs already there from palidino i was just wondering how to make it hit twice. thanks.

item.title: Spec atks hit double
item.dc:creator: @coolcool coolcool
item.description:
@coolcool wrote:

Yes I needed that cuz I asked for spec atks? NO , I asked for DDS double hit with spec…

Thanks for trying to help i guess :s

Read full topic

item.title: Spec atks hit double
item.dc:creator: @fooote fooote
item.description:
